advancements.masquerader_mod.invitation_: Get invited to an exclusive social event
advancements.masquerader_mod.ballroom_ad: Show up for the party just a little bit tardy
advancements.masquerader_mod.masquerader: Crash the ball and defeat the Masquerader
tooltip.masquerader_mod.invitation:
A mysterious envelope of unknown origin
Right-click to open and reveal its contents
tooltip.masquerader_mod.blank_mask:
When worn, it has no effect
With certain items and a little magic, this mask could grant special abilities
tooltip.masquerader_mod.evoker_mask: When worn, with an empty hand, right-click the ground to evoke fangs
tooltip.masquerader_mod.illusioner_mask: When worn, with an empty hand, right-click the air to teleport horizontally in the direction you're facing
tooltip.masquerader_mod.ravager_mask: When worn, with an empty hand, right-click the air to roar, rocketing nearby mobs away from you and invigorating you for a short time after
tooltip.masquerader_mod.witch_mask: When worn, with an empty hand, right-click the air to gain a beneficial potion effect that varies depending on your situation
